name: league-pass-spoiler-blocker
description: A web browser extension to remove spoilers when watching NBA games via League Pass
author: RobTheFiveNine

scripts.build:dev: rm -rf build && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode development --devtool inline-source-map
scripts.build:zip: yarn build && mkdir -p zips && (cd build && zip -r ../zips/league-pass-spoiler-blocker_$(grep '"version"' manifest.json | grep -oP "\d.\d.\d" | tr -d '\n').zip *)
